entry.title: The British Museum Will Enter the Metaverse via 'The Sandbox'
entry.summary: The cultural institution plans to establish an interactive space within the Ethereum-based world, as well as offer up NFT collectibles.

entry.title: You Can Now Build Your Own AI Girlfriend—Here's How
entry.summary: Andreessen Horowitz wants to redefine the meaning of "companionship" with AI, and is providing the tools to make it happen.

entry.title: Grayscale Argues SEC Should Approve All Bitcoin ETFs at the Same Time
entry.summary: The firm is suing the SEC over denials to convert GBTC into a spot Bitcoin ETF.

entry.title: Fashion Brand MNTGE's New NFTs Unlock Physical Patches From Noted Artists
entry.summary: MNTGE's Ethereum NFTs can be redeemed for patches from the likes of Jen Stark and OSF, along with Nyan Cat and Bored Ape Yacht Club artists.

entry.title: NatWest Customer 'Debanked' for Crypto Trading Amid Nigel Farage Row
entry.summary: A Facebook group comprising 10,000 former NatWest customers is taking action against the bank's allegedly opaque debanking practices.

entry.title: Stablecoin Bill Stymied, House Financial Services Chair Blames White House
entry.summary: House Republicans are pressing ahead with a bill to regulate stablecoins, but Democrats say that it's inadequate for the task.

entry.title: Sazmining to Open Green Bitcoin Mining Facility in Paraguay, Tap Itaipu Dam
entry.summary: The Paraguay mining facility will come online in September, joining Sazmining’s existing facility in the U.S.

entry.title: 'EF Defense' Mobile Strategy Game Launching on Immutable zkEVM
entry.summary: Android and iOS game EF Defense, from developers behind the popular Endless Fantasy game, will deploy on the Ethereum scaling network.

entry.title: Iconic Electronic Music Platform Beatport Launches NFT Marketplace on Polkadot
entry.summary: To mark Beatport’s Web3 launch on Polkadot, it's issuing the limited collection ‘NACHTS’ from Berlin-based photographer Mischa Fanghaenel.

entry.title: Andreessen-Backed Eco’s Newest Crypto Wallet Marries ‘Web2 With Web3’, Says CEO
entry.summary: Web2 in the front, crypto in the back; Beam, Eco’s second product launch aims to onboard the “truly mainstream.”

entry.title: Palm Network to Launch NFT Creators' Platform on Polygon Supernet
entry.summary: The collab between ConsenSys-backed Palm Network and Polygon aims to drop costs and improve efficiency for creators and brands entering Web3.

entry.title: Tokenization Firm Securitize Kicks Off European Campaign in Spain
entry.summary: Already established in the U.S., Securitize is now set to issue its first tokenized security in the European Union.

entry.title: Metaverse Giant Animoca Brands Plunges $30M Into Crypto 'Super App' hi
entry.summary: Best known for teaming up with Mastercard to customize credit cards with blue-chip NFTs, hi hints that brands in the Animoca family could be next.

entry.title: DOJ Doesn't 'Intend to Proceed' With Campaign Finance Charge Against Sam Bankman-Fried
entry.summary: The DOJ told the court Wednesday that charges related to political donations weren’t mentioned in the original extradition by the Bahamas.

entry.title: Sotheby's Historic Dutch Auction: Vera Molnár's Generative NFT Artworks Fetch $1.2M in Ethereum
entry.summary: 'Themes and Variations' sold out in just an hour, with trading volume on the secondary market jumping as high as 457 Ethereum.

entry.title: North Korean Hacker Cell Lazarus Allegedly Behind $60M Alphapo Hack
entry.summary: According to crypto investigator ZachXBT, the hack may be linked to Lazarus due to the group’s "very distinct fingerprint on-chain."

entry.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Says He Bought 14 Bitcoin for His Kids
entry.summary: The Democratic candidate for U.S. President also blasted banks for succumbing to political pressure.

entry.title: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' RPG Mashes Up Discord, Generative AI, and Solana NFTs
entry.summary: Shown at Solana's PlayGG event, Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos taps into AI and blockchain alike for a decidedly unique concoction.

entry.title: Uncensored and ‘Insane’: A Look at OpenAI’s Secret Image Generator
entry.summary: The unreleased generative imaging tool doesn’t shy away from nudity and gore, and puts MidJourney on notice.

entry.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.

entry.title: Don’t Like Twitter’s ‘Ugly’ X Brand? Get the Bird Back With This Extension
entry.summary: A crypto developer has built a browser tool for Twitter aficionado to restore the classic logo.

entry.title: Accusations of a Government Cover-Up Dominate Congressional UFO Hearing
entry.summary: Witnesses claim there is first-hand evidence of the existence—and possession—of alien spacecraft.

entry.title: Reddit Launches More Polygon NFTs—After Already Minting 18 Million Avatars
entry.summary: Cool Cats and Aku are in the mix for the new Collectible Avatars NFT drop, with prices ranging from a couple bucks to $200 apiece.

entry.title: Feds Want Sam Bankman-Fried Jailed Until Trial Over Alleged Witness Tampering
entry.summary: Federal prosecutors accused Bankman-Fried of trying to discredit a witness in talking to the New York Times.

entry.title: Democrats Attack New Crypto Bill for Weak Consumer Protections
entry.summary: Democratic lawmakers claim Republicans are catering to large crypto companies and undermining the SEC.

entry.title: Researchers Pitch ‘Immunizing’ Images Against Deepfake Manipulation
entry.summary: A team at MIT says injecting tiny disruptive bits of code can cause distorted deepfake images.

entry.title: Netflix Pushes Ahead with AI Hiring Despite Industry-Wide Strike
entry.summary: The streaming giant is offering up to $900,000 for roles in R&D and machine learning.

entry.title: Bitcoin Holds Steady After Federal Reserve Raises Rates to 22-Year High
entry.summary: The Federal Reserve today said it would continue to hike interest rates—but Bitcoin and Ethereum did not immediately move.

entry.title: What Is Tokenization?
entry.summary: We explore what tokenization is, how it works, and how it's revolutionizing the way assets can be issued, managed, and traded.

entry.title: 'Star Atlas' CEO After Massive Layoffs: 'Nothing About Our Vision Has Changed'
entry.summary: After laying off 73% of its team, Star Atlas developer ATMTA says it remains focused on building out the Solana-based NFT space game.

entry.title: Coinbase Is the Real Winner in the Bitcoin ETF Race—Here’s Why
entry.summary: Coinbase has been tapped by BlackRock and others to help launch a Bitcoin ETF, and its stock price has felt the bump. But the company still faces significant risks.

entry.title: 'Legends at War' Mobile Game Launching on Avalanche Subnet
entry.summary: Android and iOS game Legends at War, endorsed by "Game of Thrones" star Hafthor Bjornsson, will get an NFT-powered version on Avalanche.

entry.title: Binance Withdraws Crypto License Application with German Regulator BaFin
entry.summary: Binance's issues in Europe continue to escalate as the crypto exchange faces another regulatory setback in Germany.

entry.title: Italian Central Bank-Backed Hub Taps Polygon, Others to Bring TradFi Deeper Into DeFi
entry.summary: The aim is to create an environment where more TradFi institutions can get involved in DeFi minus the risks facing retail investors.

entry.title: From Early Computers to NFTs: Vera Molnàr's Pioneering Art Journey at Sotheby's
entry.summary: Vera Molnár's new generative art series reimagines typography with algorithms, marking the kickoff of Sotheby's Gen-Art Program.

entry.title: Ethereum Generative Art Challenger Highlight Takes on Art Blocks
entry.summary: The Haun Ventures-backed Highlight, which debuts today, claims to be the first "open access" generative art NFT platform on Ethereum.

entry.title: Binance’s New General Counsel On the Cutting Edge of Crypto Regulation
entry.summary: Each day brings “a legal question which there’s no precedent for,” says top lawyer Eleanor Hughes, as Binance works to build trust in the industry.

entry.title: South Korea Rolls Out Interagency Investigation Unit to Tackle Crypto Crime
entry.summary: South Korea is ramping up fight against crypto crime with the launch of multi-agency virtual asset crime investigation unit.

entry.title: Lido Finance DAO Mulls Introducing New Dual Governance Model
entry.summary: LDO holders currently hold the keys to the bank, which could put the Lido Finance’s staking community at a disadvantage.

entry.title: Crypto Gaming Startup Ultra Launches Esports Platform With Token, NFT Prizes
entry.summary: Ultra Arena features on-chain digital identities and reputation, with an aim to help amateur players rise up the ranks—and maybe even go pro.

entry.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO
entry.summary: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.

entry.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor
entry.summary: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.

entry.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect
entry.summary: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.

entry.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies
entry.summary: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.

entry.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead
entry.summary: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.

entry.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder
entry.summary: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.

entry.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta
entry.summary: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.

entry.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.

entry.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO
entry.summary: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.

entry.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.

entry.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers
entry.summary: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.

entry.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder
entry.summary: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.

entry.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?
entry.summary: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.

entry.title: Ex-Activision VP Michael Lee: Gaming Is Crypto's 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Former Activision Vice President Michael Lee is now the SVP of Growth at Matter Labs. At the 3XP gaming conference, Lee sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss crypto gaming and give his predictions for the industry.

entry.title: Behind the Scenes with AMGI Studios and My Pet Hooligan
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes to Burbank, California for a behind-the-scenes tour of AMGI Studios, the developers of upcoming game My Pet Hooligan.

entry.title: Why Legend of Arcadia Chose Sui Over EVM Chains
entry.summary: Legend of Arcadia Executive Producer Andy Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game and why they switched from EVM to new protocol Sui.

entry.title: Rumble Racing Star Game Preview: Is This Mario Kart With NFTs?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin shares a first look at Delabs' upcoming lawn mower racing game Rumble Racing Star, which offers a large cast of quirky characters pulled from the worlds of Bored Ape Yacht Club, Pudgy Penguins, and more.

entry.title: Why Laguna Games Turned Down 'Game of Thrones' for Crypto Unicorns
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Laguna Games about why the team chose to move away from an offer with WB Games to develop a Game of Thrones licensed title—and made Crypto Unicorns instead.
